amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that the conferees on the part of the Senate for H. J. Res. 2 should insist that certain amendments to the Homeland Security Act of 2002 be included in the conference report.

vote.text: Amendment SA 248 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 248 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S1438-1439; text: CR S1439) To express the sense of the Senate that the conferees on the part of the Senate for H. J. Res. 2 should insist that certain amendments to the Homeland Security Act of 2002 be included in the conference report.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 248 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 248 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
